Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Casa on Gregory in Parap, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Fannie Bay Race Course and Museum and Art Gallery of the Northern Territory. This hotel is within close proximity of George Brown Darwin Botanic Gardens and Mindil Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Casa on Gregory.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Casa on Gregory.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Casa on Gregory in Parap, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Fannie Bay Race Course and Museum and Art Gallery of the Northern Territory. This hotel is within close proximity of George Brown Darwin Botanic Gardens and Mindil Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fannie Bay Race Course - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Museum and Art Gallery of the Northern Territory - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
George Brown Darwin Botanic Gardens - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Mindil Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
SKYCITY Casino - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Cullen Bay Marina - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Darwin Entertainment Centre - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Aquascene - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Crocosaurus Cove - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Smith Street Mall - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Bicentennial Park - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Darwin War Memorial - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Darwin Waterfront - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Parliament House - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Darwin Convention Centre - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi

The preferred airport for Casa on Gregory is Darwin, NT (DRW-Darwin Intl.) - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
